I'm starting with a high offer of $1,000,000.  This is a strong opening position, and hopefully, Bob will see the value of the product and be willing to negotiate. If he rejects, I'll be prepared to counter and adjust my price based on his response. I'm also aware that I can always fall back to John's offer of $800,000 if negotiations with Bob become unproductive.
